item.title: 美国企业为关税囤积现金而非回购股票
item.description: 上个月，美国公司宣布的股票回购（按美元计算）是自科维德大流行以来最少的，这是担心经济增长和全球贸易战影响而囤积现金的早期迹象。【原文：US companies last month announced the fewest stock buybacks, in dollar terms, since the Covid pandemic, an early sign of cash hoarding from worries about economic growth and the impact of a global trade war.】

item.title: 摩根大通关税日交易看多汽车制造商债券
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Beaten-down corporate bonds from automakers could rally after Wednesday’s tariff announcement from US President Donald Trump, making the debt an attractive purchase, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 据说埃尼公司将为 Plenitude 讨论 130 亿欧元的估值
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，埃尼公司（Eni SpA）正在为其 Plenitude 可再生能源部门讨论高达 130 亿欧元（140 亿美元）的潜在估值（包括债务），因为该公司正在为该业务的股份收集竞标。【原文：Eni SpA is discussing a potential valuation of as much as €13 billion ($14 billion) including debt for its Plenitude renewables arm as it gathers bids for a stake in the business, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚最高央行行长回击总统攻击
item.description: 在哥伦比亚总统指责央行拒绝降息是破坏经济的一天之后，央行行长莱昂纳多-比利亚尔（Leonardo Villar）表示，应对政治压力是 "工作的一部分"。【原文：A day after Colombia’s president accused the central bank of economic sabotage for its refusal to cut interest rates, bank Governor Leonardo Villar said that dealing with political pressure is “part of the job.”】

item.title: 特朗普的贸易战迫使加拿大决定是否打击美国汽车业
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）领导的政府正准备对白宫最新推出的进口税大举反击，加拿大的汽车买家正努力抵御贸易战带来的价格上涨。【原文：Vehicle buyers in Canada are trying to beat the price hikes of a trade war, as the government of Prime Minister Mark Carney prepares to strike back against the latest fusillade of import taxes from the White House.】

item.title: 巴伦先生犯罪播客背后的真实故事
item.description:
约翰-艾伦（John Allen），网名 "MrBallen"，经营着一家拥有 70 名员工的公司，他的家人曾获得普利策奖

。【原文：

John Allen, known online as MrBallen, operates a 70-person company with his Pulitzer Prize-winning family on staff

】

item.title: 莱茵河燃料运输因水位过低而受限
item.description: 欧洲莱茵河上一个重要航点的浅水限制了石油驳船的运载量。【原文：Shallow water at a key waypoint on Europe’s Rhine river is limiting the amount of cargo oil barges can carry.】

item.title: Grubhub 在纽约市主要市场重塑无缝外卖品牌
item.description: 餐饮外卖公司 Grubhub 正在其最大的市场纽约重振拥有四分之一世纪历史的 Seamless 品牌，以期在这个关键城市推动增长，因为它在全国范围内都落后于竞争对手。【原文：Food delivery company Grubhub is reviving the quarter-century-old Seamless brand in New York, its biggest market, in a bid to drive growth in a key city as it lags behind rivals nationally.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税前经济担忧加剧，美国股市下滑
item.description: 周三，不确定性再次笼罩市场，交易员们对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在收盘后宣布的关税政策忐忑不安。【原文：Uncertainty gripped markets again on Wednesday with traders on edge ahead to President Donald Trump’s tariff announcement after the closing bell.】

item.title: 中国酒业巨头茅台年收入增长放缓
item.description: 贵州茅台酒股份有限公司（Kweichow Moutai Co.【原文：Kweichow Moutai Co. reported slower revenue growth in 2024 as the Chinese liquor maker tightened inventory controls to address the price volatility of its flagship spirit.】

item.title: 欧洲复兴开发银行今年将向乌克兰能源行业投资 10 亿欧元
item.description: 欧洲复兴开发银行计划今年向乌克兰能源行业投资 10 亿欧元（11 亿美元），因为乌克兰的能源设施在俄罗斯的袭击中遭到了破坏。【原文：The European Bank for Reconstruction and Development plans to invest €1 billion ($1.1 billion) this year in Ukraine’s energy sector after facilities were devastated by Russian attacks.】

item.title: 瑞士交易所转向规模较小的英国交易所进行贸易技术改造
item.description: 瑞士和西班牙证券交易所运营商 SIX 集团正在考虑改用 Aquis Exchange Plc 的交易技术。【原文：SIX Group AG, the operator of the Swiss and Spanish bourses, is weighing a switch to the trading technology of Aquis Exchange Plc, a smaller UK exchange it is in the process of acquiring.】

item.title: 欧盟国家寻求保留 2025 年天然气储存灵活性的选择权
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，欧盟成员国正在提出一个方案，可能会使今年的天然气储存目标更加灵活。【原文：European Union member states are putting forward an option that may make gas storage targets more flexible for this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 安大略省福特推动不含墨西哥的加美贸易协议
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）即将宣布对全球进口商品征收关税前几小时，安大略省省长再次呼吁加拿大与美国达成双边贸易协议，将墨西哥排除在外。【原文：Ontario’s premier reiterated his call for Canada to strike a bilateral trade deal with the US, cutting out Mexico, hours before tariffs on global imports were set to be unveiled by US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 欧洲央行施纳贝尔重提联合债务问题以加强欧元的作用
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔（Isabel Schnabel）说，现在是时候在欧元区再次讨论联合债务问题了，因为决策者们看到了加强欧元在全球经济中的作用的机会。【原文：European Central Bank Executive Board member Isabel Schnabel said it’s time to talk about joint debt again in the euro area as policymakers see an opportunity to bolster the currency’s role in the global economy.】

item.title: 任天堂将于 6 月 5 日发布新款 Switch 2 游戏机
item.description: 任天堂公司将于6月5日发布新款Switch 2游戏机，力图通过2017年推出的畅销机型的新版本来保持视频游戏设备的第一名。【原文：Nintendo Co. will release its new Switch 2 console on June 5, seeking to keep the No. 1 spot in video-game devices with a new version of the top-selling model it introduced in 2017.】

item.title: 美国港口计划令业界担忧，中国船舶销售崩溃
item.description: 航运公司几乎已经停止购买在中国建造的干散货商品船，因为该行业正在观望特朗普总统是否会对在中国建造的船只征收历史性的港口费。【原文：Shipping companies have all-but stopped buying dry bulk commodity carriers that were built in China as the industry waits to see if President Trump will press ahead with historic port charges on vessels constructed in the Asian country.】

item.title: Patreon 与索尼、Wondery 建立播客合作关系，订阅量接近 700 万
item.description:
去年，播客在该平台上的收入超过 4.72 亿美元

。【原文：

Podcasters made more than $472 million on the platform last year

】

item.title: 3G 创始人 Marcel Telles 是 Merama 2.15 亿美元融资的投资者之一
item.description: 拉丁美洲电子商务控股公司 Merama Inc. 在一轮股权和债务融资中筹集了 2.15 亿美元，公司估值超过 10 亿美元，吸引了包括 3G Capital 创始人 Marcel Telles 在内的投资者。【原文：Merama Inc., a Latin American e-commerce holding company, raised $215 million in a round of equity and debt funding that valued the company at more than $1 billion and attracted investors including 3G Capital founder Marcel Telles.】

item.title: 尼日利亚奈拉上涨，货币储备跃升至三年新高
item.description: 在尼日利亚央行称净外汇储备攀升至三年多来的最高点后，尼日利亚奈拉兑美元汇率创下两周来的最大涨幅。【原文：Nigeria’s naira climbed the most against the dollar in two weeks after the central bank said net foreign-exchange reserves climbed to the highest in more than three years.】

item.title: 南非议会继续就财政框架展开辩论
item.description: 尽管一些议员提出了反对意见，开普敦国民议会周三仍就作为预算基础的南非财政框架进行了辩论。【原文：A debate on South Africa’s fiscal framework, which underpins the budget, proceeded in the National Assembly in Cape Town on Wednesday, despite objections from a number of lawmakers.】

item.title: 波兰顶住降息压力，保持利率稳定
item.description: 波兰中央银行维持利率不变，因为人们担心近期疲软的通胀可能再次加速。【原文：Poland’s central bank kept interest rates unchanged amid concerns that recently soft inflation could again accelerate.】

item.title: 科勒从布鲁克菲尔德部门购买 16 亿美元私人贷款
item.description: 科勒资本（Coller Capital）从布鲁克菲尔德财富解决方案公司（Brookfield Wealth Solutions）旗下的一个部门购买了价值 16 亿美元的直接借贷组合，这是有史以来最大的此类交易之一。【原文：Coller Capital has bought a direct lending portfolio worth $1.6 billion from a unit of Brookfield Wealth Solutions, in one of the largest such deals on record.】

item.title: 特朗普的信任为开发 21 亿美元的媒体股份打开了大门
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）持有媒体公司 Truth Social 21 亿美元的股份，监管该公司的一个信托基金正在为其头寸套现铺平道路。【原文：A trust overseeing Donald Trump’s $2.1 billion stake in the media company that owns Truth Social is paving the way to cash in on its position.】

item.title: 瑞士考虑授权基因编辑以促进作物生长
item.description: 瑞士正在考虑修改规则，允许基因编辑，这反映了整个欧洲旨在提高作物产量的广泛转变。【原文：Switzerland is considering a change of its rules to allow gene editing, reflecting a broader shift across Europe aimed at increasing crop yields.】

item.title: 普京允许高盛出售俄罗斯石油和天然气股票
item.description: 根据周三公布的一项命令，弗拉基米尔-普京总统允许高盛国际出售俄罗斯最大的能源生产商和其他一些公司的股票，这笔交易目前价值约 8700 万美元。【原文：President Vladimir Putin is permitting Goldman Sachs International to sell shares of Russia’s largest energy producers and some other companies, in a deal currently worth around $87 million, according to an order published Wednesday.】

item.title: ADP 数据显示美国企业新增 15.5 万个就业岗位，高于预期
item.description: 上个月，美国公司的招聘速度加快，从因部分地区恶劣天气而疲软的 2 月份开始反弹。【原文：Hiring at US companies accelerated last month, rebounding from a weak February marked by severe weather in some regions of the country.】

item.title: 全球经济衰退加剧，特斯拉 3 月在华交付量下滑 11
item.description: 特斯拉公司上海工厂的交付量连续第六个月下降，延续了全球销量下滑的趋势，该品牌在中国竞争异常激烈的电动汽车市场的份额持续下降。【原文：Tesla Inc.’s deliveries from its Shanghai factory fell for the sixth straight month, extending a global sales decline as the brand continues to lose share in China’s ultra-competitive electric-vehicle market.】

item.title: Roblox 在游戏平台上推出更多儿童安全工具
item.description:
以儿童为中心的服务面临着加强家长控制的压力

。【原文：

Kid-centric service has faced pressure to bolster parental controls

】

item.title: 罗宾逊亿万富翁的太空太阳能初创公司融资 5000 万美元
item.description: 经纪公司 Robinhood Markets Inc.的亿万富翁联合创始人经营的一家硅谷初创公司正在为一项在轨道上建设太阳能电网的计划获得新的资金。【原文：A Silicon Valley startup run by the billionaire co-founder of brokerage firm Robinhood Markets Inc. is receiving new funding for a plan to build a solar power grid in orbit.】
